1.title: Personal Identity

episode of.title: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: Before anyone can truly build a happy and healthy relationship with someone else, one must learn to understand the importance of their own personal identity. Relationship expert, Debra Fileta will unpack the importance of knowing who you are and what you want before jumping into a relationship with someone else.

2.title: Faith

episode of.title: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: What role does faith play in looking for a spouse and building healthy relationships? Will having separate beliefs cause problems in the long run? How important is faith when searching for a significant other? Biola University's director for Marriage and Relationships, Chris Grace will break down the layers of faith and explain its importance within building happy and healthy relationships.

3.title: Communication

episode of.title: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: Communication skills are a must as it pertains to building happy and healthy relationships. Pastor of Fellowship Monrovia, Albert Tate will explain the keys to exercising great communications skills, conflict resolution, and learning to be a great listener.

4.title: Intimacy

episode of.title: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: There is more to intimacy than a physical connection. Speaker, author and founder of XXXChurch, Craig Gross will explain the many facets of intimacy including the reality of spiritual and emotional connections, the roles they play in building relationships, and how we can better understand them as someone who is single looking to find their perfect match.

5.title: Attraction

episode of.title: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: How important is attraction in a relationship? Should it be your main focus when searching for a spouse? Can attraction grow over time? Best-selling author and popular speaker, Shaunti Feldhahn will discuss the physical, spiritual and emotional sides of attraction that one will encounter when seeking after a significant other.

imdb.plot outline: The Relationship Series by ChristianMingle aims to equip believers with the tools needed to grow healthy and happy relationships. Bringing in relationship experts from multiple fields of study, the series highlights core characteristics of Christian-focused relationships and provides practical advice on creating, nourishing, and growing in happy healthy relationships.
